meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a soft beige hue.
meanings.sent2: She chose a beige dress for the party.
meanings.sent3: The beige paint blended perfectly with the furniture.
meanings.sent4: The desert sand resembled the color beige under the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The artist mixed white and brown to create a beautiful beige shade.

meanings.definition: To make something beige in color.
meanings.sent1: She will beige the walls to match the new carpet.
meanings.sent2: They decided to beige the curtains for a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally beiged his favorite shirt in the laundry.
meanings.sent4: The decorator will beige the room to create a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The painter will beige the canvas before starting the artwork.
